channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The evangelical Christian faith on display at Kirk's memorial shaped his politics
item.description: Charlie Kirk's evangelical faith was on display at his memorial, where supporters remembered him as a "martyr." Christianity shaped Kirk's politics an...

item.title: Super Typhoon Ragasa Hits the Philippines, Headed for Hong Kong
item.description: Thousands were evacuated and hundreds of flights have been canceled ahead of the major storm, equivalent in wind speed to a Category 5 hurricane.

item.title: Rheumatoid arthritis kept her captive. This nerve stimulator set her free.
item.description: A new surgically implanted device the size of a lima bean can help control rheumatoid arthritis that isn't responding to drugs.

item.title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un ready to talk if U.S. drops denuclearization demand
item.description: Kim told North Korea's legislature he's ready to resume talks, adding he had "good memories" of President Trump, despite ongoing tension over Washingt...

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Charlie Kirk Memorial
item.description: High-profile conservative speakers, including President Trump, addressed a packed stadium in Arizona. Erika Kirk forgave her husband’s killer.

item.title: Trump Appointees Roll Back Enforcement of Fair Housing Laws
item.description: Interviews and internal documents show that signature civil rights protections in housing are being dismissed as ideologically driven and D.E.I. in di...

item.title: What to know as U.N. General Assembly opens, marking 80 years, tackling deep crises
item.description: This year the United Nations is marking its 80th anniversary, but diplomats don't have much to celebrate.

item.title: The U.N.’s Future, and the ‘Hamburger Helper Economy’
item.description: Plus, would you swim in the Chicago River?

item.title: This small Virginia island could be underwater before the next century
item.description: Tangier Island in Virginia — one of the last inhabited islands in the Chesapeake Bay — is under threat from rising sea levels and climate change.

item.title: As U.N. General Assembly Gathers, Here’s What to Watch For
item.description: A look at major figures who will appear during the week and what they might talk about.

item.title: Cyberattack Forces Brussels Airport to Cancel More Flights
item.description: Delays and cancellations, which snarled traffic at major European travel hubs over the weekend, continued into a fourth day.
